snippet: As Afghan officials reported the crashes of a small plane and a helicopter, the NATO coalition identified victims of a helicopter crash the day before.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar and Ahmad Shakib contributed reporting.

abstract: Two Afghan military planes crash in different parts of country, latest in recent spate as Taliban highway blockades force Afghan defense forces to resupply through the air.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: As Afghan officials reported the crashes of a small plane and a helicopter, the NATO coalition identified victims of a helicopter crash the day before.

headline.print_headline: As Taliban Block Roads, Travel by Air Gets Deadlier
headline.main: As Taliban Block Afghan Roads, Travel by Air Gets Deadlier
